levels.description: Delays blastblights and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblights and reduces blast damage.

name: Bleeding Resistance

levels.description: Reduces damage while Bleeding.
Greatly reduces damage while Bleeding.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

name: Iron Skin
description: Grants protection against Defense Down.

levels.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 50%.
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 75%.
Prevents Defense Down.

Negates major and minor wind pressure.

description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

levels.description: Nullifies minor ground tremors.

Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

levels.description: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

levels.description: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

levels.description: Nullifies heat damage.

Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

levels.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.

description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity, with an extra 15% on wounded parts.

description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 15% and reduces charge times by 15%.

name: Master Mounter

levels.description: Makes it easier to mount monster and down mounted monsters (+25%).

levels.description: Negates knockback during jumps.

levels.description: Jumping attack power +30%

name: Elemental Airborne
description: Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.

levels.description: Jumping elemental damage +50% (+100% for Insect Glaive)

name: Latent Power
description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion. (1): After taking 180 damage or after 300 seconds, for 90 seconds. (2): After taking 120 damage or after 270 seconds, for 120 seconds.

levels.description: (1) Increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
(1) Increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
(1) Increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
(1) Increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
(1) Increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
(2) Iincreases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
(2) Increases affinity by 60% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Agitator
description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

levels.description: While active, grants Attack +4 and increases Affinity by 5%
While active, grants Attack +8 and increases Affinity by 5%
While active, grants Attack +12 and increases Affinity by 7%
While active, grants Attack +16 and increases Affinity by 7%
While active, grants Attack +20 and increases Affinity by 10%
While active, grants Attack +24 and increases Affinity by 15%
While active, grants Attack +28 and increases Affinity by 20%

name: Peak Performance
description: Increases attack when your health is full.

levels.description: While active, grants Attack +5.
While active, grants Attack +10.
While active, grants Attack +20.

name: Heroics
description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

levels.description: While active, increases Defense by 50 points.
While active, increases Attack by 5% and increases Defense by +50.
While active, increases Attack by 5% and increases Defense by +100.
While active, increases Attack by 10% and increases Defense by +100.
While active, increases Attack by 15% and increases Defense by +100.
While active, increases Attack by 25% and increases Defense by +150.
While active, increases Attack by 40% and increases Defense by +150.

name: Adrenaline
description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

levels.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when Health is at 40% or lower.

name: Fortify
description: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle, up to two times.

levels.description: Increases Attack by 10% and Defense by 15% with each activation.

name: Resentment
description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

levels.description: While active, grants Attack +5.
While active, grants Attack +10.
While active, grants Attack +15.
While active, grants Attack +20.
While active, grants Attack +25.

name: Resuscitate
description: Increases evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

levels.description: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time (Evasion Lv5) and reduces stamina depletion (Constitution Lv5).

name: Horn Maestro
description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

levels.description: Melody duration +60 seconds, Healing Melodies recover more Health.
Melody duration +90 seconds.

name: Capacity Boost
description: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

levels.description: Shell/Phial capacity +1

name: Special Ammo Boost
description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

levels.description: Increases the power (+10%) of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power (+20%) of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

description: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

levels.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.
Increases power of each attack by 40% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 60%.
Increases power of each attack by 50% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 70%.

name: Heavy Artillery
description: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.

levels.description: Firepower +50%
Firepower +100%

levels.description: Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Constitution
description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

levels.description: Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

levels.description: Enables Leap of Faith.

name: Stamina Surge
description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

levels.description: Stamina recovery speed +10%
Stamina recovery speed +20%
Stamina recovery speed +30%

name: Hunger Resistance
description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

levels.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Evade Window
description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

levels.description: Very slightly increases invulnerability window (8 frames).
Slightly increases invulnerability window (9 frames).
Increases invulnerability window (10 frames).
Greatly increases invulnerability window (11 frames).
Massively increases invulnerability window (12 frames).

name: Evade Extender
description: Increases evade distance.

levels.description: Slightly extends evasion distance.
Extends evasion distance.
Greatly extends evasion distance.

name: Guard
description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

levels.description: Guard Rating +10.
Guard Rating +10 and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Guard Rating +20 and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Guard Rating +30 and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Guard Rating +30 and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Guard Up
description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

levels.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

name: Quick Sheath
description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

levels.description: Sheathing speed +10%.
Sheathing speed +20%.
Sheathing speed +40%.

name: Wide Range
description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

levels.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Item Prolonger
description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

levels.description: Item effect duration +10%
Item effect duration +25%
Item effect duration +50%
Poison duration +20%.

name: Free Meal
description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

levels.description: Activates 25% of the time.
Activates 50% of the time.
Activates 75% of the time.

name: Speed Eating
description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

levels.description: Slightly increases item use speed (-1 second).
Moderately increases item use speed (-2.5 seconds).
Greatly increases item use speed (-3.5 second).

name: Speed Sharpening
description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

levels.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Bombardier
description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

levels.description: Explosive power +10%
Explosive power +20%
Explosive power +30%
Explosive power +40%
Explosive power +50%

name: Mushroomancer
description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

levels.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms (restores a small amount of health) and toadstools (increases health recovery).
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms (attack power +5) and parashrooms (defense +15).
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras (maxes out health), devil's blight (reduces stamina usage and increases stamina regen), and exciteshrooms (random mushroom effect).

name: Pro Transporter
description: Increases your speed while transporting items and deceases the likelihood of dropping them.

levels.description: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

name: Master Gatherer
description: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

levels.description: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

name: Honey Hunter
description: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

levels.description: One extra honey per gather.

name: Carving Pro
description: Prevents knockback while carving.

levels.description: Prevents knockback while carving.

name: Carving Master
description: Lets you carve one additional time. (Not effect when joing mid-quest.)

levels.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (Not effect when joing mid-quest.)

name: Divine Blessing
description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

levels.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%. Base activation chance: 25%
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 60%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 60%. Chance of activation goes from 25% to 40%.

name: Palico Rally
description: Increases the attack and defense of your Palico.

levels.description: Increases Palico Attack and Defense by 5%.
Increases Palico Attack and Defense by 10%.
Increases Palico Attack and Defense by 15%.
Increases Palico Attack and Defense by 20%.
Increases Palico Attack and Defense by 25%.

name: Botanist
description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

levels.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

name: Geologist
description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

levels.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

name: BBQ Master
description: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

levels.description: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

name: Master Fisher
description: Improves your skill at fishing.

levels.description: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

name: Maximum Might
description: Increases affinity as long as stamina is kept full for a period of time (5 seconds).

levels.description: While active, increases Affinity by +10%. Effect duration: 2 seconds.
While active, increases Affinity by +20%. Effect duration: 3 seconds.
While active, increases Affinity by +30%. Effect duration: 3 seconds.
While active, increases Affinity by +40%. Effect duration: 4 seconds
Increases Affinity by +40% as soon as the stamina gauge is full.

name: Slinger Capacity
description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.

levels.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from ground or plants even more.
Increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo.

name: Stealth
description: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

levels.description: Makes it slightly easier for Monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for Monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for Monsters to lose sight of you.

name: Flinch Free
description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

levels.description: Prevents knockbacks. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
Prevents knockbacks and tripping. Increaes some Kinsect extract effects.

name: Scoutfly Range Up
description: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

levels.description: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

name: Speed Crawler
description: Increases movement speed while crouching.

levels.description: Increases movement speed while crouching.

name: Survival Expert
description: Extra health is recovered from enviromental interactables like Sporepuff or Wiggly Litchi.

levels.description: Interactables restore an additional 50 Health.
Interactables restore an additional 80 Health.
Interactables restore an additional 100 Health.

name: Aquatic/Polar Expert
description: Lets you more freely in water. Also prevents you being slowed down by terrain effects, such as deep snow.

levels.description: Prevents movement speed from being lowered.
Increases your evade windows (9 frames) and prevents lowered movement speed.
Greatly increases evade window (11 frames) and prevents lowered movement spreed.

name: Muck Resistance
description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

levels.description: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

name: Cliffhanger
description: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.

levels.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

name: Blindsider
description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

levels.description: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

name: Scholar
description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)

levels.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

name: Entomologist
description: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

levels.description: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

name: Effluvia Resistance
description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

levels.description: Reduces effluvial buildup.
Greatly reduces effluvial buildup.
Prevents effluvial buildup.

name: Scenthound
description: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

levels.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 50%.

name: Forager's Luck
description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

levels.description: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

name: Detector
description: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

levels.description: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

name: Tool Specialist
description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

levels.description: Shortens time until reuse by 10%.
Shortens time until reuse by 20%.
Shortens time until reuse by 30%.
Shortens time until reuse by 40%.
Shortens time until reuse by 50%.

name: Affinity Sliding
description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

levels.description: Increases Affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding. Effect duration: 30 seconds.

name: Elderseal Boost
description: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.

levels.description: Elderseal Rating +1.

name: Intimidator
description: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)

levels.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

levels.description: Activates skill effects.

name: Protective Polish
description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

levels.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening. Effect duration: 1 minute.

name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
description: 50% chance to not lose Sharpness when landing hits. Shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo. Shelling costs -1 Sharpness.

levels.description: When activated, Sharpness usage -1. 25% chance to not use coatings, 20% chance to not use ammo.

name: True Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
description: 70% chance to not lose sharpness when landing hits. Shots have a greater chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

levels.description: When activated, Sharpness usage -1. 30% chance to not use coatings or ammo.

name: Bow Charge Plus
description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

levels.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

name: Non-elemental Boost
description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

levels.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped by 5%.

name: Offensive Guard
description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard. Effect duration: 12 seconds.

levels.description: While active, increases Attack by 5%.
While active, increases Attack by 10%.
While active, increases Attack by 15%.

name: Coalescence
description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal statuses.

levels.description: While active, grants Attack +12, Elemental Attack +30, and Status Buildup +5%
While active, grants Attack +15, Elemental Attack +60, and Status Buildup +10%
While active, grants Attack +18, Elemental Attack +90, and Status Buildup +15%

name: Capture Master
description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

levels.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Bludgeoner
description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boost ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

levels.description: Attack +15/+25/+30 at green/yellow/orange sharpness. Ranged weapon melee attack gains +30 Attack and +25 Stun.

name: Igni Intensity
description: Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.

levels.description: Allows use of Igni Sign without the Hunter's Runestone.

name: Master's Touch
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

levels.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

name: Nullify Wind Pressure
description: Negates all wind pressure.

levels.description: Negates all wind pressure.

Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon. The skill regenerates a set amount of health if you hit the monster at least 5 times within 5 seconds (every hit exceeding the first every second won't be counted).

name: Super Recovery
description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

levels.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
When above 60 Health, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

name: Stamina Cap Up.
description: Increases stamina capacity up.

levels.description: Increases stamina capacity up (+50).

name: Good Luck
description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

levels.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Great Luck
description: Often increases the number of rewards received at the end of a quest. (Does not work if joining a quest in progress)

levels.description: Often increases the number of rewards received at the end of a quest. (Does not work if joining a quest in progress)

name: Frostcraft
description: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.

levels.description: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.

name: Critical Status
description: Increases abnormal status effect buildup (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

levels.description: Increases Status Buildup by 20% (40% for heavy weapons) when landing critical hits.

name: True Critical Status
description: Greatly abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

levels.description: Increases Status Buildup by 40% (60% for heavy weapons) when landing critical hits.

name: Critical Element
description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

levels.description: Increases Elemental Damage when landing critical hits. Increase depends on weapon.

name: True Critical Element
description: Greatly increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

levels.description: Greatly increases Elemental Damage when landing critical hits. Increase depends on weapon.
Raises the maximum level of Latent Power Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Free Meal Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Bombardier Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Slugger Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Maximum Might Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Agitator Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Stamina Thief Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Artillery Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Divine Blessing Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Slinger Capacity Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Tool Specialist Skill.
Raises the maximum level of Heroics Skill.
Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage (+60). Triggers after ~5-7 consecutive hits and lasts 45 seconds.
Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv3 and increases elemental damage (+150). Triggers after ~5-7 consecutive hits and lasts 45 seconds.
While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv3, Earplugs Lv3, Tremor Resistance Lv3, and Flinch Free.
While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv5, Earplugs Lv5, Tremor Resistance Lv3, and Flinch Free.
Prevents zombie and effluvial buildup.
Elemental damage +80, Abnormal Status Buildup +80, & Affinity +20% with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
Elemental damage +150, Abnormal Status Buildup +120, & Affinity +40% with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
Increases odds of getting special Festival rewards (No effects when joining mid-quest.)
Greatly increases odds of getting special Festival rewards. (No effects when joining mid-quest.)
Elemental Attack increases as Elemental Resistances increase.
Increases all Elemental Resistances by +20%.
Remove the skill level cap for skills with Secret levels.
Grants True Razor Sharp/Spare Shot. Health and Stamina caps +100 at the start of a quest or after fainting.
